title: Exclusive Boy
description: Maltipoo boy with an exclusive color, 2.5 months old, weight will be 3 kg. Has two vaccinations, vaccinated with two vaccines, a CHIP, and an international passport.

title: Amazing Girl
description: A small fluffy ball of happiness: this cute Maltipoo puppy will bring you a sea of joy, affection, and warmth, always be there and lift your spirits.

title: Best Companion
description: The perfect family companion: Maltipoo - loyal, loving, and always ready to play! A great choice for a family looking for a faithful friend.

title: Fluffy Angel
description: Fluffy angel: this Maltipoo will charm you with its cute look, gentle character, and ability to give love every day.

title: Little Sunshine
description: Little sunshine: this Maltipoo puppy radiates warmth, joy, and is always ready to lift your spirits with its cheerful and playful character.

title: Friend for Kids
description: Friend for kids: Maltipoo is a great choice for a family with children, it is gentle, friendly, and always ready to play.

title: Furry Optimist
description: Furry optimist: Maltipoo - small, but incredibly energetic, a cheerful companion who will make your days brighter and happier.
